DOC.brief_summary: This research study is being done to collect regular and routine follow-up information related to the outcome of treatment for prostate cancer. This study is also being done to relate treatment outcome to measurement of substances in the blood such as prostate-specific antigen (PSA) and other markers. Also environmental and genetic factors that might be responsible for prostate cancer are being investigated.
